title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers to talk with the Ollama API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama models as LLM and embeddings providers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; runs entirely in browser.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with POJO model mapping and reactive streams.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and managing Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI (TUI) for interactive chats powered by Ollama, built with Go.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline code copilot.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) and docker-compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation keeping Ollama and its model cache reproducible.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama with serde types and tokio streams.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with full async/await and System.Text.Json support.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST API that wraps Ollama for multi-user chat and RAG.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: Lightweight FastAPI proxy that adds OpenAI-compatible endpoints to Ollama.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot server that answers channel mentions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI autocomplete and note Q&A via Ollama.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit demo showing RAG pipeline combining LlamaIndex + Ollama for PDF chat.
